forecast.day_comments: Snow, mainly before 3am. The snow could be heavy at times.  Low around 11. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly before 7am.  Cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 25. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
